TopicTitle: Looking to create a modding team

Articles.Content:
I am looking for a modding team to make a mod or two with.

I have 3ds max and photoshop so i can make the model and texture i just cant code to save my life right now

I like the idea, but I have limited experience with C# (my experience is mainly Java), I could take a bit more of a look, maybe try and figure something out.

Oh also feel free to use the concepts in my signature as I lack the experience/ability with Blender to fully realize them, but I just might be able to get them to work...
I can do what you need for CFGs (Within reason)
What kind of modding are you looking to do?
I dont know yet what i want to make
Ok so I just found out I cant do 3d modeling for the time being seeing that I cant get 3ds max to install

I would recommend RL rocket replicas, would you like to join my team over here making the castor 30?

link:http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57942-WIP-Castor-30-Mod

I've finished the model, I just need to texture it(simple job, black body with white nozzle but I could use some help with the logo on the side), would you be interested in making the rest of the antares?(first stage, interstage decoupler fairing base and fairings) PM me with your answer.

Good news i got 3ds Max now

Congrats and welcome to the illustrious ensemble of ksp addon makers!

Now you just have to come across an idea, either your own or someone else's, you're excited about.

About not being able to code: as long as you don't want any new functionality you can make awesome mods without ever touching code.
yea I gonna think aobut it all daay today
If anyone would like to become part of my group just send me a pm
I mentioned it before but if you want you can use any of the concepts in my signature. I know I cant model with Blender or anything, just cant figure out how to use them.
I think I rather make some parts for the game
